name: Xisal_859793_Var01_r05_d08_a01_b03
description:
Xisal combines three separate periodic formulae, mappping each one onto a dot-matrix grid with separate ranges and offsets. Noise is taken from circular motion on a 2D noise field with its own radius and offset. These values are mapped onto a range of colours according to one of seven different algorithms, and rotation is added to produce interference patterns with a choice from eight rendering modes.
The initial seed for this loop of 240 frames is 859793, which selects function 1 with offset (-80.0, -2.0), range (6.0, -6.0), and function 3 with offset (-12.0, -70.0), range (0.0, -5.0). Noise is produced from sampling points on an ellipse at co-ordinates (60.0, 22.0) with diameters (3.0, 3.0). The three formulae are combined using algorithm 5 with hue values starting at 346 with range 172. The grid is 113 units square.
